TMR_SR_PortPair Struct Reference

#include <serial_reader_imp.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint8_t txPort
uint8_t rxPort

Detailed Description

This structure is returned from TMR_SR_cmdGetTxRxPorts and TMR_SR_cmdGetAntennaSearchList, and passed as a parameter to TMR_SR_cmdSetAntennaSearchList.

Member Data Documentation

uint8_t TMR_SR_PortPair::rxPort

The receive port.

uint8_t TMR_SR_PortPair::txPort

The transmit port.
